item.title: Integrability of polynomial vector fields and a dual problem
item.description: arXiv:2409.04322v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We investigate the integrability of polynomial vector fields through the lens of duality in parameter spaces. We examine formal power series solutions anihilated by differential operators and explore the properties of the integrability variety in relation to the invariants of the associated Lie group. Our study extends to differential operators on affine algebraic varieties, highlighting the inartistic connection between these operators and local analytic first integrals. To illustrate the duality the case of quadratic vector fields is considered in detail.
item.dc:creator: Tatjana Petek, Valery Romanovski
